page.title: 06Kelfield cont.
page.content: Milk is delivered door to door daily by Northern Dairies, who also bring bread, butter, cream, eggs and potatoes. There is a travelling shop and a bread delivery service, and a local woman cycles round morning and evening delivering newspapers. The mobile library visits once a fortnight.{ { A building firm is based in Kelfield, {and there is a self-employed {plasterer. Three market gardeners and {seven farms over a hundred acres are {in the parish. Some pigeon fanciers, {and a professional hot air {balloonist/author live in the village. { A flood bank now protects the {village from flooding by the river {Ouse, but there are fears of {subsidence when coal mining in the {Selby coalfield gets underway. }
